sentences.en: Carl slipped a disc in his back while warming up.
sentences.cn: 热身时卡尔腰椎间盘不慎错位了。

sentences.en: Getting Hollywood's latest films released on laser-disc has also helped.
sentences.cn: 通过激光视盘发行好莱坞最新电影也起到了一定作用。

sentences.en: He took the compact disc from her, then fed it into the player.
sentences.cn: 他从她手里接过光盘，放入播放机中。

sentences.en: He wears an identity disc around his neck.
sentences.cn: 他脖子上挂着圆形身份牌。

sentences.en: Powell ruptured a disc in his back and was laid up for a year.
sentences.cn: 鲍威尔的椎间盘破裂，在床上躺了一年。

sentences.en: Sony has also led the way in shrinking the size of compact-disc players.
sentences.cn: 索尼公司在缩小CD播放机的体积方面也处于领先地位。

sentences.en: The compact disc is a miracle of modern technology.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片是当代技术的奇迹.

sentences.en: The gramophone had been eclipsed by new technology such as the compact disc.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片等新技术使留声机黯然失色。

sentences.en: The soundtrack of "Highlander II" will be released on compact disc at Easter.
sentences.cn: 《挑战者2》的电影原声光盘将在复活节时发行。

sentences.en: The turning disc is connected by a drive belt to an electric motor.
sentences.cn: 转盘由一根传动带与电机相连。

sentences.en: They've just lent me a laser disc player.
sentences.cn: 他们刚借了我一部激光视盘播放机。

sentences.en: This glass disc looks very fragile.
sentences.cn: 这个玻璃盘子看起来很容易碎.

sentences.en: three keys attached to a metal disc
sentences.cn: 穿在金属圆盘上的三把钥匙

sentences.en: Today's floppy disc drives are tolerant of poor quality discs.
sentences.cn: 现在的软驱对质量低劣的软盘也能读取。

phrases.tran_cn: 制动盘；闸盘；碟式刹车盘
盘形铣刀，盘形滚刀；磨削圆锯；圆盘刀具
光盘；光具盘；频闪观测盘

trans.tran_cn: 圆盘状物，椎间盘，唱片，（计算机）磁盘
trans.tran_en: a round flat shape or object
